com.model.timer

Interface TimerStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountdownTimerStrategy, StopWatchStrategy

    public interface TimerStrategy
    Created by ivan on 25/04/17. Class built under the Strategy pattern: both the stopwatch timer and the countdown timer have the same actions but they perform them differently. Therefore, they both implement this interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void associate(Task task)
      Associates a task to a timer from which it gets the initial time, target time and mode
      long getCurrentTime()
      Gets the current time of the timer
      long getInitialTime()
      Gets the initial time of the timer
      boolean getIsStopped()
      Returns whether the timer is stopped or not
      long getTargetTime()
      Gets the target time of the timer
      Task getTask()
      Gets the task associated to this timer
      void reset()
      Resets the timer
      boolean run()
      Increments or decrements the current time of the timer until it reaches the target time
      void setMode(Mode mode)
      Sets the timer mode (it can either be UNLIMITED -- keeps counting even if the other timer hits zero or LIMITED -- stops when the other timer hits zero
      void start()
      Starts the timer
      void stop()
      Stops the timer
